bibl.title: Imperial Policy and Changed Composition of the Auxilia: The ""Change in A.D. 140"" Revisited.
bibl.note: An earlier version of this paper was presented at the Work in Progress day of Impact of Empire on 17 December 2009 at Amsterdam. - I. The formula of auxiliary / fleet diplomas before 140. - II. The ""change in 140"" and its impact on veterans' families. - III. Reasons for the ""change in 140"". - IV. The change in formula of praetorian fleet diplomas in 158. - Conclusion. - P. 21: Addendum. - Refers to the situation of veterans in Egypt. - Avec résumés en anglais, en allemand et en français.
bibl.seg: Sofie Waebens, Imperial Policy and Changed Composition of the Auxilia: The ""Change in A.D. 140"" Revisited.

An earlier version of this paper was presented at the Work in Progress day of Impact of Empire on 17 December 2009 at Amsterdam. - I. The formula of auxiliary / fleet diplomas before 140. - II. The ""change in 140"" and its impact on veterans' families. - III. Reasons for the ""change in 140"". - IV. The change in formula of praetorian fleet diplomas in 158. - Conclusion. - P. 21: Addendum. - Refers to the situation of veterans in Egypt. - Avec résumés en anglais, en allemand et en français.
